    • Bookshelf

    • Bookshelf

      public Bookshelf(String bookshelfString) throws WrongLengthBookshelfStringException, WrongCharBookshelfStringException, NullPointerException
      This constructor takes a 30 char long string containing the content of a bookshelf, with each tile associated to a letter, as shown below and builds and returns the matching bookshelf object.
      Parameters:
      bookshelfString - A string that allows us to fill the bookshelfGrid with the correspondence between each char and the position in the grid, there's a map to help us matching the char with the Tile.TileType
      Throws:
      WrongLengthBookshelfStringException - If when building a bookshelf based on string, it is of an invalid length.
      WrongCharBookshelfStringException - If when building a bookshelf based on string, it contains an invalid character.
      NullPointerException - Generic NPE.

  • Method Details

    • getBookshelfString

      public String getBookshelfString()
      Method used to get a string representation for a bookshelf.
      Returns:
      string representation of this bookshelf.

    • setBookshelfGridIndex

      public void setBookshelfGridIndex(Integer row, Integer col, Tile tile) throws BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException, BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException, NullIndexValueException, NullTileException
      Set a Tile inside the bookshelf grid.
      Parameters:
      row - The bookshelf grid row's value.
      col - The bookshelf grid col's value.
      tile - The tile to be set.
      Throws:
      NullIndexValueException - If the index provided is null.
      BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf column index is out of bounds.
      BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf row index is out of bounds.
      NullTileException - If tile is null.

    • getBookshelfGrid

      public Tile[][] getBookshelfGrid()
      bookshelfGrid getter.
      Returns:
      The bookshelf's 6x5 playground grid.

    • getBookshelfGridAt

      public Tile getBookshelfGridAt(Integer row, Integer col) throws BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException, BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException, NullIndexValueException
      bookshelfGrid index getter.
      Parameters:
      row - The bookshelf grid's row value.
      col - The bookshelf grid's col value.
      Returns:
      The tile at the given indexes.
      Throws:
      NullIndexValueException - If the index provided is null.
      BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf column index is out of bounds.
      BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the bookshelf row index is out of bounds.

    • isBookshelfFull

      public boolean isBookshelfFull()
      This function checks if player's bookshelf is full of tiles.
      Returns:
      True if bookshelf grid is full.

    • getFreeRowsInCol

      public int getFreeRowsInCol(int column) throws BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException, BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException, NullIndexValueException
      Retrieve the number of Tile.TileType.EMPTY inside the bookshelf for a given column.
      Parameters:
      column - The column to be checked
      Returns:
      The number of Tile.TileType.EMPTY
      Throws:
      BookshelfGridColIndexOutOfBoundsException - If bookshelf column index is out of bounds.
      BookshelfGridRowIndexOutOfBoundsException - If bookshelf row index is out of bounds.
      NullIndexValueException - If index value is null.
